title: So I Can No Longer Play ARAM Before the Afternoon
body:
Seems like an odd title right?

Mornings on OCE ARAM have a low player population, so are rife with bots. Games are won or lost on who has more bots on their team, not on actual gameplay.

It's fucking pathetic, and bot detection needs to be made a higher priority on Rito's list.
They put all their focus into top level play that is under 1% of the player base, while ignoring the 99% of us who are casual scrubs.

NEWSFLASH: If you neglect the common/casual player, they will quit and the game will die. Pro's don't keep the game running, the masses of general public do.

I understand that champion balance must be done in regards to top level play, but where Rito directs their resources needs adjusting.

according to riot, we were going to get tribunal back.

Yeah but ideally they wouldn't be a problem anywhere. But also lower population at an off peak time of day means matchmaking gets wider means a bigger MMR bracket is affected.

Also ARAM isn't exactly the most serious mode, and you'll often get champions you have little or no idea how to play, so winning more isn't exactly something you can just do, even if you make a concerted effort to improve.
